name: 2020.02/ProjetoIV/Ancient Winds
description:
CRISTIAN P. DREYER :  Programmer.

FELIPE ZUMMACH DAHMER: 3D Modelling & 3D Animations.

JULIA VANTI: 2D Artist, 2D Animations, Level Designer, 2D Concept Artist, Audio Editing, Texturing & Screenwriter.

LEONARDO GOMEZ DE VARGAS VIEIRA : 3D Modelling & Textures.

MARCELO DORNELES FIGUEIRÓ: Video editing.

We are game developers from Feevale University, Brazil. All 2D art was made by Julia Vanti and the 3D arts were made by Leonardo Gomez and Felipe Zummach. The music and sound effects were taken from Freesound.org and Purple Planet Music.

ADVISORS:

Guilherme Theisen Schneider

Eduardo Fernando Müller
